alert.note: Alert for Branch (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Severe Thunderstorm Warning issued July 26 at 2:02PM EDT until July 26 at 2:15PM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 215 PM EDT FOR EASTERN BRANCH COUNTY... At 202 PM EDT, a severe thunderstorm was located near Reading, or 9 miles southeast of Coldwater, moving east at 50 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and penny size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Expect damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Coldwater, Quincy, Ray, Kinderhook, California, South Butler, Marble Lake, and Coldwater Lake. This includes Interstate 69 in Michigan between mile markers 1 and 18. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...0.75 IN WIND THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. Torrential rainfall is occurring with this storm, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.
